title: What kind of projects should I build when applying for an interview in a company? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, I am not sure of the background you ask for project. If you are from software industry, they don’t care of your projects,If you are a fresher. If you are an experienced them you will be having the knowledge of applying for the project in which you have worked. I believe the same goes will all the backgrounds in case of experienced. But they will check your projects even if you are a fresher. In that case, your projects should have been based on the companies domain, like robotics, solar etc.,. But those are just added advantage. Generally companies just test your knowledge.
